lead_paragraph: New Zealand are keen to build on the momentum of the inaugural day-night test with their own 'pink ball' match, possibly against the touring South Africans, next season.

headline.print_headline: NZ Keen to Host South Africa in Pink Ball 'Extravaganza'
headline.main: NZ Keen to Host South Africa in Pink Ball 'Extravaganza'

snippet: New Zealand are keen to build on the momentum of the inaugural day-night test with their own 'pink ball' match, possibly against the touring South Africans, next season....
